title: Inquisitor
description: You have dedicated your life to rooting out heresy and punishing those who stray from the true path. Your methods are ruthless but effective.

title: Pious Scribe
description: A devout follower, you have spent years copying sacred texts and preserving the teachings of your faith.

title: Puritan Enforcer
description: A staunch protector of the faith, you enforce strict moral codes with an iron will and unflinching resolve.

title: Covenant Scholar
description: You have devoted your life to studying and interpreting the doctrines of your reformist faith.

title: Fanatical Crusader
description: A relentless warrior of your faith, you live to spread your beliefs through combat and zealotry.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Combat Skills, +1 to Athletics.

title: Prophet of the End Times
description: You are a fiery preacher, proclaiming the imminent downfall of all who do not repent and follow the true path.

title: Dark Ritualist
description: You conduct forbidden rituals in the shadows, channeling dark energies to achieve your nefarious goals.

title: Occult Broker
description: A secretive figure, you deal in arcane artifacts and forbidden knowledge, trading in the shadows.

title: Void Seer
description: Guided by the whispers of the Void, you see beyond the veil of reality and commune with ancient powers.

title: Eldritch Acolyte
description: You serve the unseen masters, carrying out their will in secret and preparing the world for their return.

title: Warden of the Wilds
description: A protector of ancient traditions, you guard the sacred places and rituals of the old ways.

title: Herbalist Healer
description: Trained in the arts of herbalism and natural magic, you use your skills to heal and protect your kin.

title: Master Artificer
description: As a follower of Rex Mundi, you are a renowned inventor and craftsman, dedicated to perfecting your mechanical creations.

title: Guild Merchant
description: A shrewd trader, you have risen through the ranks of the guilds, mastering the art of commerce and negotiation.

title: Rationalist Philosopher
description: A thinker and skeptic, you question everything and seek to understand the world through reason and logic.

title: Industrial Engineer
description: Rejecting superstition, you have dedicated yourself to mastering technology and advancing human industry.
